summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackCurlsmith Double Cream Deep Quencher is an intense deep conditioning treatment that nourishes and moisturizes even the driest hair types.
details: DetailsBenefitsIntense deep conditioner that targets the driest areas of the hair to re-moisturizeGives great slip to the hair and helps detangleUse once a week for healthier, softer and shinier hairThick, buttery texture that melts onto each hair strandSuitable for coarse or dry hairVegan, cruelty free, clean ingredients and curly girl friendlyDesigned for all curls and texture typesKey IngredientsShea butter for ultimate nourishmentResurrection flower (aka Rose of Jericho), desert plant that survives up to 3 years without water, known for its moisture-retention propertiesAndiroba, indigenous plant of the Amazon forest known for its nourishing propertiesAvocado, Apricot Kernel and Sunflower oil for ultimate nourishmentAloe, Sage, Rosemary, Pepper and Basil extracts, known for their antioxidant propertiesFormulated WithoutSulfatesSiliconesDrying alcoholsItem 2553408How To UseAfter your regular wash routine apply generously over the hair, focusing on the lengths and ends. For a quick moisture boost, leave on for 10-15 minutes before rinsing. For a deep moisturizing treatment, leave on for 30 minutes, then rinse.IngredientsWater (Aqua/Eau ), Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Propanediol, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil*, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil*, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Selaginella Lepidophylla (Resurrection Flower) Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Carapa Guaianensis (Andiroba) Seed Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Ocimum Basilicum (Basil) Leaf Extract, Piper Nigrum (Black Pepper) Seed Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Cetyl Palmitate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Panthenol, Polyquaternium-10, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Sodium Gluconate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Glycerin, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Fragrance (Parfum), Limonene, Linalool. *Certified Organic Ingredient
how_to_use: After your regular wash routine apply generously over the hair, focusing on the lengths and ends. For a quick moisture boost, leave on for 10-15 minutes before rinsing. For a deep moisturizing treatment, leave on for 30 minutes, then rinse.

reviews.headline: My favorite conditioner!
reviews.comments: I use this product line for my fine but very curly hair. This conditioner is my go to on wash days. Very hydrating without weighing my hair down.

reviews.headline: Great curl definition and shine
reviews.comments: This conditioner left my curls looking shiny and nicely defined. I use it twice a week.

reviews.headline: Great for all hair types
reviews.comments: This stuff has worked on all hair types great hair mask !!! Have purchased for almost 2 years now and is always in my home !!!?

reviews.headline: gave me a bad reaction
reviews.comments: i used this product for a couple of weeks, and i realized it was giving me body acne. i have sensitive skin, and the acne did not go away until i stopped using this product. it smells good but i also dont remember if it really did anything good for my hair

reviews.headline: Didn't work for me
reviews.comments: I use clarifying shampoo once a week, and I want a deep conditioning treatment for afterwords. This isn't it. It leaves my fine, 2c hair feeling like straw and IMPOSSIBLE to comb through.

reviews.headline: Curls were Poppin!
reviews.comments: I finally found a good deep conditioner with no protein. This one had my curls so soft and juicy. I didn't use any heat just a shower cap for 30 mins.

reviews.headline: Excellent moisturizer
reviews.comments: I've been working on receiving my curl pattern and this conditioner works so great on my curly/coily hair. Smells amazing too!

reviews.headline: Not as moisturizing as I had hoped
reviews.comments: The water where I live is hard, and i have fine, wavy hair, so I usually clarify my hair once every week or two to remove all the product buildup. I found a clarifying shampoo i like, but have been looking for a good deep conditioner to follow up with. I was hoping this would be it, but it's not moisturizing enough. Using this deep conditioner leaves my hair dry, and my curls flat. Not a great combo. I plan to try some other products that work better with my hair.

reviews.headline: Thickening feeling but tangly ends
reviews.comments: It definitely made my hair thicker and my curls more defined,  however my ends were tangled.

reviews.headline: Best for 2c 3a hair
reviews.comments: I love this line! Been on a long journey to help restore my curls. Will continue to use from now on! Love the smell

reviews.headline: Polarizing smell
reviews.comments: I have to force myself to use this product as I hate the smell. I see others that love it- maybe I got a spoiled batch or it's just different options but my suggestion is trying a sample or at least a sniff test before purchasing because the whole half hour treatment time can be rough on delicate noses!

reviews.headline: nope
reviews.comments: This conditioner does nothing for my hair. It has no slip to detangle and it does not leave my hair feeling soft. Waste of money and time applying it

reviews.headline: takes time at least for me.
reviews.comments: I have curly hair and decided to give this brand a try. at first I was not impressed. my hair was dry and felt like straw. but I was determined and didn't want to give up. after a couple of uses I started to see results. I couldn't use the drug store brands anymore for none of the products were working for me. I have now been using this brand for 4 years now and will never go back to drug store brands. the one time I did I made the biggest mistake and had to work on my hair again for another few weeks. this may not be for everyone but I love their products.

reviews.headline: takes time at least for me.
reviews.comments: I have curly hair and decided to give this brand a try. at first I was not impressed. my hair was dry and felt like straw. but I was determined and didn't want to give up. after a couple of uses I started to see results. I couldn't use the drug store brands anymore for none of the products were working for me. I have now been using this brand for 4 years now and will never go back to drug store brands. the one time I did I made the biggest mistake and had to work on my hair again for another few weeks. this may not be for everyone but I love their products.

reviews.headline: Smells like bug spray, doesn't moisturize
reviews.comments: This conditioner smells horrible. I usually love earthy herbal scents but this smells like bug spray and citronella. It also doesn't moisturize my hair. Drug store conditioner works better.

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: I've tried several methods and different amounts for application with this product and none of so work for my hair. It leaves my hair feeling gross, dry and hard to manage. It does define a bit, but that alone is not enough for me to be able to justify continued use or want to recommend it to anyone.

reviews.headline: Ok, but Doesn't Detangle
reviews.comments:
The product is quite thick and not the easiest to distribute through the hairâ€¦but working it in my hands for a sec before applying, does help the consistency some. My hair is very protein sensitive, so this provides a good option for when I want to stay away from protein yet still need deep conditioning. 
It can be hard to rinse-out thoroughly, so it's definitely worth the extra time and effort to make sure and rinse carefully. My biggest complaint is that it does ZERO to help detangle. This product doesn't have much slip, so I always have to follow it with a lightweight detangling conditioner, or im left with tons of nasty tangles. 
     ALL of this said, my hair feels and looks so nice after using this product, its worth combatting the quirks! Its hard to find a good, moisturizing conditioner that doesn't contain protein, so I'm definitely going to keep repurchasing.

reviews.headline: I really do hope the formula didn't change
reviews.comments: I have always loved this Product however, either. I got a bad batch or the formula has changed. I will take it back and exchange it and hopes that it just was a bad batch.

reviews.headline: Excellent curl definition and hydration
reviews.comments: I straightened my hair all the time for most of my life and just recently decided to embrace the curl. Ive tried just about every product oit there and this is the only one I've had noticeable amazing results with. I do the 30 minute mask and my curls are bouncy and defined with no frizz! Definitely my new favorite product!

reviews.headline: My holy Grail!
reviews.comments: Omg when I tell you that I    love this stuff. I mean it. Ive been using this since it came out and I was influenced. But this stuff is  legit my kids  have 4c-ish hair and after regular use, along with a curly girl routine. We haven' t looked back since, my daughter wash n go's are super quick and easier now (she is just learning). and its the same consistant great results.

media.headline: NOT FOR BLEACHED HAIR!! DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY LIKE I DID
NOT FOR BLEACHED HAIR!! DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY LIKE I DID
NOT FOR BLEACHED HAIR!! DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY LIKE I DID
NOT FOR BLEACHED HAIR!! DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY LIKE I DID
NOT FOR BLEACHED HAIR!! DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY LIKE I DID
This deep conditioning is Amazing my hair love it ðŸ˜Š

faceoff_positive.comments: Wow! Y'all this is a dense cream, I was afraid my hair couldn't hold this and be greasy. But I was dealing with protein overload and saw the great reviews for this so I ordered. I put a small amount of this on my hair and thought I'd take my blow dryer to this to help some of the oils penetrate, not long just a few minutes enough to get it warm. I jumped in the shower and shampoo and conditioned with biolage moisture shampoo and and prayed my hair wasn't going to be laying in a flat greasy mess when I got out. This rinsed out very easily and I almost thought did it even do anything? Till I got out, and went to carefully untangle my hair with my dentangling brush, which normally has a rough time and it slid thru like butter. I couldnt believe it, and I didn't feel as if I had a heavy residue or anything in my hair either! Now here is the crazy part, I let my hair air dry 80% and done the last bit with a blow dryer like always, can you imagine the surprise when my lifelong limp hair had VOLUME. That I was NOT expecting! Nothing added to my hair or anything it was just full and had life! I can't even get that with a ton of products and even then my hair is left tacky and will be even worse off from the weight the following day so I just don't do it. I have straight fine thin hair that has always been highlighted (although not in the last 8 months ðŸ˜© thanks Covid) I don't know if I am more blown away that my hair is so well moisturized or that it has volume! I am more than thankful to run across this product and for all the detailed reviews you all left that helped me decide to get this, thank you!!!
faceoff_positive.headline: THIN FINE HAIR

faceoff_negative.comments:
Hair type: My curly type is constantly ranging from 2c-3a. I have a lot of fine, naturally dirty blonde hair that has been continuously bleached to platinum since about 2016. Every time after I get any sort of bleaching done on my hair, I will immediately put a hair mask on and it usually rejuvenates it very well and (along with avoiding heat at all costs) my hair feels extremely healthy until it is bleached again. 

MY HAIR FELT HORRIBLE after I did a 30 minute deep moisturizing treatment. This was immediately my hair had been through more than usual that day with bleaching. It felt horrible and DRY the next week until I showered again and it did nothing for my curls. If anything they were too dry to curl well and nicely. Essentially this product made my hair look horrible. 

I tried to give it another chance and did a 15 minute "quick moisture boost" in the shower the next week. You know how when you put on a hair mask or even conditioner you can feel your hair becoming softer as you apply or rinse the product out? This did not happen with me. As I was putting it on it felt horrible and as I was rinsing it out it felt horrible. I had to apply my conditioner on top of it to salvage my poor hair (shout out to Moroccan oil conditioner!) 

I saw some reviews of people complaining about the smell. My sense of smell isn't extremely sensitive but it's not that bad if you just take a small sniff of it, taking a giant sniff though will be overwhelming. It doesn't make your hair smell overwhelming but of course your hair will have the smell. Describing smells isn't my strong suit but I would say it's a weird combination of starburst smell and possibly coconut oil. Honestly that is the least of your worries with this product though. 

If you have my hair type, DO NOT WASTE $35 ON THIS LIKE I DID!!
faceoff_negative.headline: NOT FOR BLEACHED HAIR!! DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY LIKE I DID
